    • Demo: One-Dimension Location

Demo: One-Dimension Location

Source: vignettes/demo.Rmd
demo.Rmd

Basic settings

library(SpatPCA)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
base_theme <- theme_classic(base_size = 18, base_family = "Times")

Steps

Set a True eigenfunction

set.seed(1234)
position <- matrix(seq(-5, 5, length = 100))
true_eigen_fn <- exp(-position^2) / norm(exp(-position^2), "F")

data.frame(position, eigenfunction = true_eigen_fn) %>%
ggplot(aes(position, eigenfunction)) + geom_line() + base_theme

Generate realizations based on the eigenfunction

realizations <- rnorm(n = 100, sd = 3) %*% t(true_eigen_fn) + matrix(rnorm(n = 100 * 100), 100, 100)

Apply SpatPCA::spatpca to estimate dominant eigenfunctions of realizations

cv <- spatpca(x = position, Y = realizations)
eigen_est <- cv$eigenfn

Compare SpatPCA with PCA

data.frame(position = position, true = true_eigen_fn, spatpca = eigen_est[, 1], pca = svd(realizations)$v[,1]) %>%
  gather(estimate, eigenfunction, -position) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = position, y = eigenfunction, color = estimate)) + geom_line() + base_theme

Developed by Wen-Ting Wang.
